attributes.shortDescription: Curated set of 6 pure essential oils (10ml each): Lavender, Eucalyptus, Peppermint, Tea Tree, Lemon, and Frankincense. Includes bamboo storage box, dropper caps, and comprehensive usage guide. Perfect for beginners or as a thoughtful gift.
attributes.title: Essential Oil Starter Collection
attributes.description: Complete starter set of 6 pure essential oils with bamboo storage box and usage guide for aromatherapy beginners.
